A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointed\, so many huge plot holes. Instead of characters playing out organic feeling actions and decisions\, what we are given feels like a conciously created outline which plays out like checkmarks on a list: a rediculous feeling\, plothole-filled list. Because of this the story feels lifeless\, which is actually worst than the not-smart plot itself. I am a Starwars fan. I feel lied-to and sad.
